'Charles McMillan' is the 10th director of the Los Alamos National
Laboratory.

Prior to joining Los Alamos, McMillan, an experimental physicist, spent more
than 20 years at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California. He holds
a doctorate in physics from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and a
bachelor of science in Mathematics and Physics from Washington Adventist
University.
